Key Match Events: Gerardo Arteaga scored the only goal of the match in the 69th minute, giving Mexico a 1-0 victory over Jamaica.
A VAR decision ruled out a goal by Jamaica's Michail Antonio for offside.
Mexico's captain Edson Álvarez was subbed out with an injury and replaced by Luis Romo.
Dexter Lembikisa made a sliding save to prevent a goal from Mexico in the first half.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas.
